text: Robert Walter Kasten Jr. (born June 19, 1942) is an American Republican politician. He was a U.S. Representative from 1975 to 1979 and a United States Senator from 1981 to 1993, representing Wisconsin. In 1985, Kasten was arrested and charged with driving under the influence in Washington, D.C.. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:United States senators from Wisconsin Category:United States representatives from Wisconsin Category:Politicians from Milwaukee Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Bob Kasten
